subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Frank ... Your Box Interests Me!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Ok, that's interesting. I did get WWII ghosts on June 6th (D-Day) one year, 
I think it was 2003, saying how they took the beaches.

It's not that "paranormal" put me off, it's the focus on the negatives that 
torques my jaws! Ya have to remember, they are in fact still people, not 
something to "hunted", banished, and chased.

Frank
